channel.title: Remmina troubles
channel.description:
Installed remmina and now trying to run it with [code]sudo remmina[/code]. But getting this:
[code]No protocol specified
** (remmina:9005): WARNING **: Could not open X display No protocol specified Unable to init server: Could not connect: Connection refused
(remmina:9005): Gtk-WARNING **: cannot open display: :0[/code]
Any ideas?

item.title: Remmina troubles
item.dc:creator: puregreen
item.description:
Installed remmina and now trying to run it with sudo remmina. But getting this:

[code]No protocol specified

** (remmina:9005): WARNING **: Could not open X display
No protocol specified
Unable to init server: Could not connect: Connection refused

(remmina:9005): Gtk-WARNING **: cannot open display: :0[/code]

Any ideas?

Read full topic
